DOC.brief_summary: The present study investigate long-term ( 12 month ) effect spironolactone treatment glucose homeostasis , metabolic parameter vascular property .
DOC.criteria: 1. patient type 2 diabetes mellitus 1. history unstable angina , myocardial infarction ( MI ) , cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) 2. major surgery within six month precede entrance study 3. unbalanced endocrine disease 4. disease might affect absorption medication 5. plasma creatinine > 2.5 mg/dl 6. elevation liver enzymes twice upper normal limit 7. plasma potassium level > 5.5 mg/dl
